message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I can say this: it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it could be worth much more to you, given your expertise in [mention Bob's industry/area of expertise]. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.  If you're not, I'll be selling it to someone else at a later date.
